duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in acute care settings, adapting to the specific needs of each patient.
Utilize clinical skills and critical thinking to assess and respond to patients' conditions.
Collaborate with medical teams and staff to ensure effective and efficient patient care.
Demonstrate compassion and empathy in all patient interactions, maintaining a supportive and caring environment.
Respond to emergencies and crisis situations with swift and effective actions.
Manage time effectively to prioritize patient care and coordinate with healthcare teams.
Adapt to different hospital settings and workflows as a float nurse, ensuring seamless integration.
